ModMetaData.name: ZeroTech-Binoic
ModMetaData.author: LingLuo
ModMetaData.description:
零子科技-仿生拓展包 添加了多个主题的仿生体/植入物 1.增幅型植入物:帮助你更好的适应这个世界的环境,或者增加某些方面的能力(例如心灵能力和机械操纵) 2.实验型殖装体:带有实验性质的人体植入式装备,可以提供极强的战斗能力或特别的功能 3.机械/动物植入物:一些能够给机械体/动物植入的特殊植入物,可以降低它们的消耗/制造的垃圾等,帮助你更好的控制它们.
个人推荐产品: 饥饿/疲倦/无聊抑制芯片:使安装者的饥饿/睡眠/娱乐需求不再下降 隐身芯片:使安装者隐形,但变得更加脆弱 肢体重构芯片:断肢再生,但不能复活死人 激光眼球:可以无冷却的释放激光 节能芯片:机械不再需要消耗能量 自律芯片:机械带宽占用减低,动物不再生成污物 自爆芯片:可手动控制自爆
Zero Tech - Bionic Expansion Pack Bionic bodies/implants with multiple themes added 1.Augmentation implants: To help you better adapt to the environment of the world, or to increase certain aspects of ability (such as psychic abilities and mechanical manipulation) 2.Experimental bionic body: human implantable equipment with experimental nature, which can provide strong fighting ability or special functions 3.Mechanical/animal implants: Some special implants that can be implanted into mechanical/animal bodies can reduce their consumption/waste, etc., to help you better control them.
Personal recommended Products: Hunger/fatigue/boredom suppression chip: The hunger/sleep/entertainment needs of the installer will no longer decrease Stealth chip: makes the installer invisible, but more vulnerable Limb reconstruction chip: regenerates severed limbs, but does not revive the dead Laser eyeball: The laser can be released without cooling Energy saving chip: machinery no longer needs to consume energy Autonomous chip: Mechanical bandwidth usage is reduced, animals no longer produce dirt Self-detonation chip: self-detonation can be controlled manually
语言Languages 简体中文(Simplified Chinese) 英文(English)
